org.catechis.admin
Class JDOMFiles

java.lang.Object
  org.catechis.admin.JDOMFiles

public class JDOMFiles
extends java.lang.Object

This class does all the work to add a user, such as creating files and folders as well as confirming if the user already exists, of the invitation code is correct.

This class does not do everything, only JDOM and file related activities. FileUserUtilities would create the lists of options, for instance that would go into the new users option file.

getClassNames

public java.util.Hashtable getClassNames()
In the teacher_id's folder is a file classes.xml with the folloring format: 0000000000000000001 jukseong5 The class_id element represents a file inside the classes folder which is just a list of student id's for students in each class. This method will rturn the class_id-class_name pairs as a Hashtable. The full path to the file must be passed in to a constructor.

getClassIds

public java.util.Vector getClassIds()
Return a Vector student ids from the file /home/timmy/Desktop/tomcat WEB-INF/files/admin/teachers//classes/.xml file which has the format: -7028961644117975960 ...
